name: 勒维耶
bio_short: 法国天文学家和数学家。他最著名的成就是通过纯数学计算预测了海王星的存在和位置，被称为“笔尖下的发现者”。他还发现了水星轨道的近日点进动异常。
bio_short_en: A French astronomer and mathematician. He is most famous for predicting the existence and position of Neptune using only mathematics, known as the 'discovery at the point of a pen'. He also discovered the anomalous perihelion precession of Mercury.
